quotes: the Washington, D.C., political advocacy and strategic communications firm Podesta Group, initially called Podesta Associates, until 1993.
Since 1995, Podesta has been a visiting professor at the Georgetown Law Center.
In 1993, Podesta joined former President Bill Clinton's White House staff, first as staff secretary, then as deputy chief of staff, and finally as chief of staff.
He became chief of staff in November 1998.
